ProductInfo.Features:
NEW Professional Grade High Definition Network Video Recorder (NVR)
1080p High Definition / Better Than DVD Quality / 30 Frames Per Second Per Channel
Audio Input, BNC + VGA + HDMI Video Output / Motion Detection Built-In / Alarm Input / PTZ Support
View Live & Recorded Video Remotely On Your iPhone, Android, Windows, Blackberry, Apple, Microsoft, Laptop, Desktop, Tablet Anywhere In The World With An Internet Connection
20 Ch @ 720P / 16 Ch @ 1080P / 4 Ch @ 3MP
